definition: abbr. for 青海[Qing1 hai3], Qinghai Province

sentences.english: North Sung, Lung-chuan is the green porcelain of southern Chinese most to produce a base.
sentences.chinese: 北宋时，龙泉是中国南方最主要的青瓷生产基地。

sentences.english: Mature celadon was achieved in the first century A. D. (Eastern Han dynasty).
sentences.chinese: 成熟青瓷约在公元一世纪的东汉时期烧造成功。

sentences.english: This article examines several questions related to carved blue and white porcelain from the Tang Dynasty Yue kiln.
sentences.chinese: 本文探讨了有关唐代越窑青瓷刻划花的若干问题。

sentences.english: At present, the blue china of Yue Kiln has been collected as the treasure by the museums all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 如今，世界各国博物馆都把越窑青瓷作为珍宝收藏。

sentences.english: Longquan celadon Product sub-daily-use porcelain and ceramic art display two broad categories.
sentences.chinese: 龙泉青瓷产品分日用瓷和陈设艺术瓷两大类。

sentences.english: The brothers are Shaozao celadon, have their own achievements.
sentences.chinese: 兄弟俩都烧造青瓷，都各有成就。

sentences.english: The article mainly carry out the research on Longquan celadon in Southern Song in four aspects.
sentences.chinese: 论文主要从四个方面对南宋龙泉青瓷进行探究。

sentences.english: Celadon is the earliest porcelain in the world.
sentences.chinese: 青瓷是世界上出现最早的瓷器。

sentences.english: In recognition of this motto, Porcelain Love is dedicated to be the best brand of Antique Porcelain Jewellery.
sentences.chinese: 青瓷之恋的宗旨是打造中国古瓷首饰第一品牌。

sentences.english: A low-slung bowl in the shape of a lotus is an example of this genre's seamless combination of beauty and functionality.
sentences.chinese: 一双青瓷莲花式温碗就是优美和功能完美结合的例证。

sentences.english: The elegant posture of the lady echoes the form of Chinese blue and white ceramics.
sentences.chinese: 而仕女的坐姿又和背景的青瓷花瓶的形态互相呼应。

sentences.english: The Paper introduces the imitation art of Linru celadon.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了临汝青瓷的仿制工艺。

definition: celadon, classic Chinese style of ceramic glaze
black eggshell pottery (of the Neolithic Longshan culture)
